Review Content: Plantie has saved my study life, as someone with undiagnosed ADHD, I struggle to focus on studying, and find it quite hard to not grab my phone and scroll endlessly. Plantie motivates me. The second I start my timer, my phone is off limits. I love the fact that if you stop the timer you don‚Äôt get coins, it would be too easy if you did. I really hope this app gets more trees, I‚Äôm working though buying them all and I‚Äôll feel so sad once I‚Äôve purchased every tree.  Things I‚Äôd love to see:  - More Trees  - An option to remove ads that‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt involve getting double coins, I want the adds gone but I enjoy the coin rate as it is (makes it harder)  - To see the fruits on the tree during the study timer, not the break (I don‚Äôt use the break option, and if I do I am out of the app. I‚Äôd love to see the cute apples and oranges etc on the tree)  - Bonus to the last one, this one is a lot as it would go into the programming side of things, but it would be cool to see either the tree grow through the timer or the fruits grow. Maybe depending on how long you‚Äôve set it for, eg, a 1 hour session (60mins) could be 6 apples on the tree, and maybe if it‚Äôs a 2 hour study, once the 1st hour goes, the apples fall and the next 6 start to grow)
App Description: Plantie is a time management app that allows you to grow and harvest your favorite fruits while stay focused on your work.  Features:  - Grow your favorite fruit while focusing on your task  - Task will be interrupted if user switch to other apps  - Keep track of your performance everyday  - Collect badges and keep motivated  - Unlock more fruits along the way

Refocus is an app blocker & website blocker that helps you limit screen time on apps!  Refocus is easy to use, yet has powerful features:  ‚ñ∂ Various ways to restrict or lock apps & block websites. Choose what helps you focus! Block ANY app or site (ex. YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, Reddit, X [Twitter], Messenger, Discord, WhatsApp and more).  ‚ñ∂ "Strict Mode" feature prevents you from unblocking. Set a passcode, or use an NFC tag, or wait a duration (ex. 30 seconds), or do a copy text challenge, or utilize Pomodoro (limit unblocking to 5 times per day, for 25 minutes each, with a 5-minute cooldown between each unblock).  ‚ñ∂ Block for a specific duration (ex. app timer for 30 minutes).  ‚ñ∂ Block at specific times (ex. every weekday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM).  ‚ñ∂ Set app limits (ex. after 10 minutes of using Instagram, block it). Set an app time limit!  ‚ñ∂ View your daily, weekly and monthly Screen Time analytics. Use Refocus as a screen time tracker!  ‚ñ∂ And more!  ---  Refocus can be used as a: - productivity app - social media blocker - ADHD app - digital detox app - distraction blocker - dopamine detox app - screen time control app - focus app - and more (ex. practice digital minimalism)!  For more, visit refocusapp.co  ---  Terms of Use: - https://refocusapp.co/terms-of-use

Review Title: I have the attention span of a cockroach.
Review Content: This app is life changing! I can study easily for 25 minutes and now I end up doing 10+ blocks a day.  Amazing resource for people with ADHD as well.
App Description: Do more in less time with 25-minute blocks. Take it one block at a time and surprise yourself with how much you can accomplish.   Inspired by tried and trusted time management techniques. Block & Flow is simple, beautiful and will get your productivity flowing.   FEATURES: - A 25-minute visual countdown keeps you focussed and avoiding distractions. - Manage your energy levels with regular breaks - Measure your day, week and longer by how many blocks you finish.  - Colour code a block for the activities that you do often or care particularly about.  - Goals enable you to be intentional with your time. - History gives you an understanding of where your time goes.  - A block‚Äôs duration can be changed to your ideal time.  WHY IT WORKS: - It makes it easy to get the day started. Just do your first block. - Creates an enjoyment and satisfaction as you see all that you get done. See your blocks build up one by one.  - It is clear when to stop. Stop when your block has finished, or after you have done x many blocks for the day. - Every block that you finish is a small success. As these small successes build-up, your self- belief grows.  - If you keep finishing your blocks. The time will add up to a lot and you will surprise yourself.  (We under-estimate what we can do in the long term).   WHO IS IT FOR? People tell me that they do x many blocks a day, or over a week which is fantastic. A few people have been completing their blocks for a year and more.  I imagine someone completing their blocks over a month, a year and ultimately many years. I believe they will grow as a person, stretch themselves, and be surprised with what they are able to learn, create and accomplish. This is what excites me and motivates me to do my best for someone that chooses Block & Flow.   What will you accomplish, one block at a time?  Happy Block & Flowing  Stefan  *********************  PRO SUBSCRIPTION: - A Monthly or Yearly Pro Subscription is offered. If you purchase a Pro Subscription payment will be charged to your iTunes account.  - Renewals will be charged 24 hours prior to the end of your current Pro Subscription.  - You can turn off auto-renewal at any time in your iTunes Store settings.    POLICIES: - Privacy Policy: https://www.blockandflowapp.com/privacy%20policy/ - Terms of Service: https://www.blockandflowapp.com/terms%20of%20service/

BePresent is the #1 app to control your screen time and supercharge your productivity, mental health, and quality of life. Experience life beyond the screen as you reclaim Your Time and earn rewards that improve your life with BePresent!  25 years. That‚Äôs the average time you will spend on your phone.   With a combination of app blocking, gamification, social competition with friends, and real-life rewards, you will reclaim YEARS of your life like thousands of BePresent members already have.  We know you‚Äôve tried to solve this problem before. But we‚Äôre not like other screen time apps.  ‚ñ∂ WHAT USERS ARE CELEBRATING ‚óÄ  ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúI was able to go from 7+ hours per day to less than 2 hours! 10/10 would recommend‚Äù - Andrew M.  ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúFINALLY an app that actually curbs my screen addiction instead of time limits that I just ignore!‚Äù - Gina V.  ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúI‚Äôve tried everything but nothing has worked. I almost gave up before I used BePresent! Thank god I tried it as I‚Äôve reduced my screen time by over 3 hours a day!‚Äù - Jack W.  Download now to experience life to the fullest.  Instead of annoying app blockers or time limits, BePresent makes it fun and easy to stay off your phone.  ‚ñ∂ FEATURES ‚óÄ  [ BePresent App Blocking Sessions - Individual, Group, & BEAST MODE ]  ‚Ä¢ Dive into Present Sessions! Dedicate breaks from screens, whether it's a focused study session or a no-phone night out. Team up with friends for Group Sessions and joint tech time-outs. Share updates, cheer, and keep one another accountable‚Äîall from within the app. Need a stringent break? Enter BEAST MODE, ensuring unwavering commitment  [ Set Daily Goals and Build Your Streak ]  ‚Ä¢ Choose your digital boundaries. Maintain your streak by sticking to set screen time limits. Back your commitment with a monetary stake ‚Äî overshoot, and that stake's gone. Customize reminders and design your journey to digital well-being.  [ Compete on Weekly Leaderboards and Challenge Your Friends]  ‚Ä¢ Show off your productivity prowess by competing against others on weekly leaderboards. Advance tiers so you‚Äôll feel like a productivity superhero every day. Practicing mindful phone habits has never been so motivating and rewarding!  [ Earn Real-Life Rewards ]  ‚Ä¢ The ultimate motivation - earn points you can redeem for real-life rewards by limiting your screen time. Best of all, your rewards will also improve your life. Learn to meditate with a premium Headspace subscription. Redeem free workout classes with ClassPass. Schedule discounted therapy sessions with BetterHelp. Earn these rewards and more all by staying off your phone.  [ Never Doomscroll Again ]  ‚Ä¢ Set hourly scrolling awareness reminders so you never lose track of time doomscrolling again  [ Time Tracking & Daily Reports ]  ‚Ä¢ Measure the moments you're truly present. Access daily and weekly breakdowns, complemented by a comprehensive day-before report, amplifying your adherence to reality.  [ Improve Your Well-Being ]  ‚Ä¢ By reducing screen time, you'll improve your overall well-being and gain access to educational content that explains how reducing screen time can benefit you in multiple ways. Learn how to manage ADHD better, improve your mental health, and be more present with your loved ones, all while improving your sleep and becoming less distracted.  [ Complete Privacy and Data Security ]  ‚Ä¢ Data dignity, delivered. All of your data is private and safe with Apple‚Äôs Screen Time API. We do not have access to any specific content you access on your iPhone, and none of your personal data ever leaves your device.  ‚ñ∂ WE'RE HERE FOR EVERY QUERY ‚óÄ  Questions or feedback? Reach us at https://www.getpresentapp.com/ or shoot an email at contact@getpresentapp.com. Let's journey to mindful tech use together.  Note: All rewards are sponsored by BePresent and our partners. Apple does not sponsor any of the in-app rewards. Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Privacy Policy: https://www.getpresentapp.com/privacy-policy

Review Content: Looked really helpful, but as someone with ADHD, the fact that I have to memorise the steps and manually setup the automations was just an immediate huge hurdle that my ADHD brain immediately wanted to run away from. Too overwhelming
App Description: In contrast to Screen Time, one sec delays access to apps and websites instead of blocking them completely ‚Äì this is fundamentally different than any other screen time tool you‚Äôve tried before!  Have you tried a digital detox? And it did not work, because you fall back into your habits immediately?¬†  Well here is the solution:  one sec solves our unhealthy phone relationship at its roots: by making distracting apps less appealing, our brains lose interest to open them all the time without proper intention.  The effectiveness of one sec has been confirmed in a peer-reviewed scientific study with the Max-Planck Institute and Heidelberg University: app usage drops by 57% on average! Long-term!  Fight the social media algorithms and win back control over your phone usage & your subconsciousness!  ‚Äúone sec‚Äù uses Shortcuts Automation to toggle a deep breath animation whenever you open one of the configured apps (Instagram, Twitter, YouTube‚Ä¶). This breaks unconcious social media habits short-term (literally, as soon as you have set it up) and even helps long-term by adding more friction when opening these apps.  Did you really want to open Instagram? Or was it just because you're bored waiting for your bus? This app helps you to reflect your actions, thoughts, and feelings; disrupting harmful social media habits with mindfulness.  On top of that, ‚Äúone sec‚Äù also contributes your mindful moments to the Health App via HealthKit.  Especially for people with ADHD one sec is a great tool to gain back control for incredible focus and concentration.  Integrations and collabs: - You can set up one sec to sync tasks with Structured, so you won't be able to access social media apps during ongoing unfinished tasks. - You can set up one sec to learn a new language with LENGO, so every time you open social media, you have to answer a handful of vocabularies.  Available Subscription Options: one sec pro (annual / monthly / lifetime unlock)  Terms (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Privacy Policy: https://one-sec.app/privacy/

Meet Productive - the app that helps you build positive life-changing habits. With Productive, you can set personal goals, track your progress, and focus on what makes you healthier, happier and more productive!  FEATURES  HABIT MANAGEMENT Create, complete, stop, or pause habits whenever it is convenient for you. Add notes to your habits to highlight the main points during the day.  PROGRAMS –°hoose your goal, receive daily habit tips, reflection check-ins, and motivation prompts to get the boost you need.   CHALLENGES Improve your daily routine by completing guided tasks and competing with other Productive users from all over the world.  ARTICLES Grow awareness of your own productivity and motivation with personalized expert insights.  CUSTOMIZATION Customize the app the way you want! You can name your habit, choose a unique icon, and even pick its color.  STATISTICS Track your habits and analyze progress by building motivating chains of completed habits and perfect days. The longer your chain of completed habits, the more likely you will keep the streak going.  NOTIFICATIONS Set up smart reminders, and personalize Productive to get notifications of what's scheduled for each part of the day.  ADHD ASSISTANCE Manage distractions and deal with ADHD by concentrating on a focused daily routine.  PREMIUM FEATURES - Unlimited number of habits - Endless motivation with various challenges - Full-text articles to draw inspiration  - Improved reminders for individual habits - Location-based reminders - Motivating stats for each habit - Habit trends with week-by-week data  Learn new skills. Form good habits. Break bad habits.   Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose.  Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.  For complete access to all Productive features, you will need to allow access to the following: *Notifications to provide you with the summary of daily due things and time reminder for your habits. Review Content: Helps motivate me to stay on track and recognise how much time tasks actually take. Used it with my ADHD son this morning and we had a spare 15 mins to play a game together before school and weren‚Äôt stressed getting out of the door ü•∞ That‚Äôs priceless!
App Description: MAKE YOUR LIFE BETTER WITH THE 'ROUTINERY' ‚ñ∫ Selected as the 2025 App of the Day by the App Store ‚ñ∫ More than 5 million people in 200 countries are using it.    Do you know what the first step to creating a better daily life is? It‚Äôs building a routine! But in today‚Äôs busy world, sticking to a routine can be really tough. That‚Äôs where 'Routinery' steps in to help you create habits and maintain a better daily life.    PERSONALIZED ROUTINE PLANNER - We offer over 800 habits you can choose from and customize as you like. - Freely plan your desired routine: weekdays, weekends, every other day, morning, all day, etc. - You can freely create routines for school, work, or leisure time. - Configure them according to your needs, such as the Pomodoro technique, pre-going routine, exercise routine, meeting preparation routine, meditation routine, Summer Glow-Up routine, and more. - It is useful for everyone, including people with ADHD, children gaining independence, office workers seeking self-development, and busy parents juggling multiple tasks.   RECOMMENDED ROUTINES FOR BEGINNERS - Start with routines that many people practice, like a water-drinking routine or a Miracle Morning routine. - Try routines recommended by celebrities like Oprah Winfrey. - Seasonal recommended routines are continuously updated, such as Summer Glow up.   ROUTINE TIMER FOR POWERFUL EXECUTION - Just start the timer on your to-do list, and we'll guide you on what to do and when. - Select the guidance method you want, such as a vibrating alarm, alarm sound, or voice guidance. - Use a device that's easier for performing routines, like a tablet or smartwatch. - While executing the routine, continue to modify and improve the execution time and timer for each habit. - Depending on the time, you can take a break from your to-do list or from the routine itself.   REVIEW COUNTABLE ROUTINE DATA - You can analyze your routine daily, weekly, and monthly. - You can also track your growth by date, individual habit, routine, and diary. - Motivate yourself by looking at your success record. - As you grow, your plant badge will grow with you.   SUPPORT AS A HABIT FORMING ENVIRONMENT - We are focusing on providing a systematic environment that allows you to execute tasks easily and intuitively without procrastination. - To sincerely support everyone who has chosen Routinery for change, we've also prepared a chatbot that delivers warm words of encouragement. - The 'Social' and 'Friends' tabs provide a function to motivate and inspire people who are trying to create habits. - We constantly reflect user suggestions so that users can try the routine again today and continue their efforts.   CONTACT US - hello@routinery.app

Review Content: The auto subscription charged me over $100. This is on top of the $14 for the trial. They do not send out reminders of when an auto subscription is due. They are taking advantage of people with ADHD who struggle with executive function.  Also the app is slow and not user friendly. Do not download! It‚Äôs a rip off

Review Content: DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS! And beware of the ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù an absolute scam of an app that once in - good luck getting out. Not connected to Apple subscriptions, to unsubscribe they make you jump through hoops and their service response takes weeks. They have a laundry list of ways you can request a refund which is a SCAM SCAM SCAM RUN AWAY. The app is also so detailed requiring a lot of input and navigates not so clearly, that in hindsight anyone with ADHD/ADD would not benefit from this setup. Feels ai created and managed. Highly do not recommend.

stoic is your mental health companion ‚Äì it helps you understand your emotions and provides insights on how to be happier, more productive, and overcome obstacles.  At its heart, stoic helps you prepare for your day in the morning and reflect on your day in the evening. In the process, we also guide you to journal with thought-provoking prompts, build better habits, track your moods, and more.  ** ‚ÄòFeatured App of the Day‚Äô - Apple **  * Join over 3 million stoics bettering their lives *  ‚ÄúI have never used a journal app that has impacted my life so much. It's my best friend.‚Äù ‚Äì  Michael  MORNING PREPARATION & EVENING REFLECTION:  ‚Ä¢ Start the perfect day with our personalized daily planner. Prepare your notes and to-do list so nothing can surprise you during the day. ‚Ä¢ Track your mood throughout the day and do bite-sized mental health exercises if you need them. ‚Ä¢ Reflect on your actions with our habit tracker in the evening to grow as a human and get better every day.  GUIDED JOURNALS:  Whether you're a journaling pro or new to the practice, stoic offers a welcoming space with guided journals, suggestions, and prompts to inspire reflection and cultivate the habit. If writing is not your cup of tea, you can also journal with voice notes and pictures/videos of your day.  Choose from topics in productivity, happiness, gratitude, stress & anxiety, relationships, therapy, self-discovery, and much more. Stoic also has templates to help you with a variety of situations like preparing for a therapy session, CBT-based thought dumps, dream & nightmare journal, etc.  Journaling is a therapeutic tool for clearing the mind, expressing thoughts, setting goals, practicing gratitude, emotional wellbeing, and promoting self-reflection.   MENTAL HEALTH TOOLS:  stoic provides you with the tools you need to feel better, reduce stress & anxiety, manage ADHD, be mindful and more.  ‚Ä¢ Meditation ‚Äì unguided or guided sessions to help you meditate with background sounds and timed chimes. ‚Ä¢ Breathing ‚Äì science-backed exercises to help you relax, focus, feel calm, sleep better and more. ‚Ä¢ Stoic Shield - block distracting apps and reduce screen time. ‚Ä¢ Sleep Better - journal your dreams, nightmares, and overcome insomnia with lessons by Huberman and Sleep Foundation. ‚Ä¢ Quotes & Affirmations ‚Äì read up on stoic philosophy and better your mood. ‚Ä¢ Therapy Notes ‚Äì prepare for your therapy sessions, track your progress, and reflect on them. ‚Ä¢ Daily Prompts - thought-provoking prompts to help you journal better.  AND SO MUCH MORE:  ‚Ä¢ Privacy ‚Äì protect your journal with a passcode, TouchID, or FaceID. ‚Ä¢ Streaks & Badges ‚Äì stay motivated on your journey with our habit tracker. ‚Ä¢ Journey ‚Äì reflect on your history, search based on prompts, see how your responses changed over time and see your growth. ‚Ä¢ Trends ‚Äì visualize metrics that matter to you including mood, emotions, sleep, health, writing, and more. ‚Ä¢ Export ‚Äì share your journal diary with your therapist. ‚Ä¢ iCloud Sync ‚Äì seamlessly sync your journal across your iPhone, Mac, iPad and Apple Watch and safely backup stoic on your personal iCloud storage. ‚Ä¢ Siri Shortcuts ‚Äì start a journal by simply asking Siri. ‚Ä¢ Health App Integration ‚Äì track your mindful minutes, sleep and more in Trends.  We‚Äôre constantly adding more mental health tools to help you overcome more obstacles and situations. You can also join our supportive community on Discord and leave your suggestions in our feedback board.  STOIC PREMIUM:  ‚Ä¢ Enjoy unlimited access to premium features on a subscription basis. ‚Ä¢ Your payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. ‚Ä¢ You can easily manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal in Apple's settings. ‚Ä¢ Read our Terms & Conditions at https://getstoic.com/terms-and-conditions  If you choose not to purchase stoic Premium, you can still journal with stoic for free.

Review Content: I have ADHD and this obviously came up in my FYP as advertised to help. I signed up for their trial but it never worked from the beginning. Only a black screen. I totally forgot about it I didn‚Äôt cancel in time and was charged the full amount at the end. I reached out to their support but never received a reply and it‚Äôs really not worth my time and energy to fight it. All in all, this was a very expensive lesson. I think it‚Äôs predatory to target neurodivergent people, pretending to be a great app and using this subscription tactic.
App Description: Shmoody: Your Personalized Wellness Companion  Shmoody is your all-in-one self-care and personal growth toolkit, designed to help you navigate tough moments and build uplifting habits over time. We're here to make feeling good feel possible.  Think of us as a space for actionable strategies and uplifting tools to help you feel more balanced, supported, and energized‚Äîno matter where you‚Äôre starting.  WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DISCOVER IN SHMOODY:  Mood Tracker: Reflect and gain insights into your patterns over time. Instant Boosts: Explore simple actions designed to lift your spirits and energize your day. Community Support: Connect with like-minded peers for encouragement and accountability. Personal Growth Challenges: Take small steps that add up to meaningful progress. Shmoody isn‚Äôt just an app‚Äîit‚Äôs your companion in cultivating a life filled with joy and purpose.  A PERSONALIZED, RELATABLE APPROACH TO WELL-BEING We‚Äôve been there too. Feeling stuck, unsure of what to do next. That‚Äôs why we created Shmoody‚Äîto provide practical, science-backed tools and a welcoming, approachable space to explore what works for you.  WHY CHOOSE SHMOODY? Shmoody is about taking one small step at a time toward feeling better and living well. It's built on real-world insights and designed to fit seamlessly into your life. No pressure, no judgment‚Äîjust simple, effective tools to support you along the way.

Do you really want to be scrolling right now?   We all know the feeling. You pick up your phone to kill a few minutes and before you know it, an hour has gone by. Wellspent is here to solve the great mystery of "where did that hour just go" because we want it back, too.  Wellspent is designed to help you find a healthy balance between productivity and play. Paired with your input, our tool creates the recipe for supporting you best and we inject your phone time with science-backed methods designed to actually help you break the cycle of scroll addiction. It‚Äôs the future of screen time self-control.   THE ADDED BENEFITS OF WELLSPENT:  - Stop wasting time on your phone - Stay focused at work - Boost your productivity all day long - Stay in control without needing digital detoxes - Manage ADHD with this tool - Redirect your attention to how you want to spend it - Get better sleep without getting lost in the scroll before bed - Be more mindful and aware of how you invest your time and attention  HERE‚ÄôS HOW IT WORKS:  - Set your budgets for problem apps so we know when to give you a full-screen check-ins - Get short and sweet full-screen check-ins that get you to stop scrolling - Language matters: decide which tone you want Wellspent to use when checking in with you. Get roasted, hyped, and more! - Stay productive, in control, and away from time-sinks  WHAT USERS ARE SAYING  ‚ÄúWellspent supports me with tracking and understanding my screen time patterns. This increased awareness prevents me from getting lost scrolling.‚Äù - Franz  ‚ÄúWhen my ADHD brain finds a TikTok rabbit hole, I used to completely lose track of time. With Wellspent, I‚Äôve learned to control my social media usage again.‚Äù - Jeannine  ‚ÄúI used to have a love-hate-relationship with social media. It‚Äôs really addictive but also way too useful to avoid. I‚Äôm glad to have Wellspent. It helps me to use my phone in a meaningful way.‚Äù - Karolina  FEATURES:  - Powerful, Full-Screen Check-Ins: You‚Äôre not alone out there in the wild west. Wellspent is right there with you. Our science-backed methods paired with your customization helps improve your screen time goals by intervening just when you need it.  - Progress Score: Stay true to your commitments and understand how healthy your phone use is day-to-day.  - Set Budgets: Not all apps are the same. Create time budgets for the categories, websites, and apps you struggle with most. You can be stricter with big problem apps like TikTok, Instagram, or LinkedIn or a little more lenient with apps like Netflix or YouTube - it‚Äôs up to you! - Choose your hero: What kind of vibe are you going for? Do you want to be roasted by a firm hand? Or maybe you‚Äôre looking for something more warm and friendly. You get to choose which tone of voice the reminders will take to motivate you.  - Skill-Building Exercises: Our team of psychologists knows exactly how to help you kick your scrolling habits in a way that sticks.  Wellspent can be tested free of charge. In addition, we offer flexible subscription models that can be cancelled at any time.  The subscription renews automatically unless it is cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current term. Your iTunes account will be charged for the next term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time through iTunes Account Settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. For more information, see our Terms & Conditions (https://www.wellspent.so/terms-and-conditions) and our Privacy Policy (https://www.wellspent.so/privacy-policy).  Do you have feedback? Feel free to write us at support@wellspent.so.
